summary.span: 命名空间包含支持 Visual Basic 编译器的仅供内部使用的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains internal-use only types that support the Visual Basic compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 Visual Basic 语言元素的详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 语言参考](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md)。For more information about the Visual Basic language elements, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md).
